org.apache.hawq.pxf.service.rest

Class FragmenterResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hawq.pxf.service.rest.RestResource
      • org.apache.hawq.pxf.service.rest.FragmenterResource

  • public class FragmenterResource
extends RestResource
    Class enhances the API of the WEBHDFS REST server. Returns the data fragments that a data resource is made of, enabling parallel processing of the data resource. Example for querying API FRAGMENTER from a web client curl -i "http://localhost:51200/pxf/{version}/Fragmenter/getFragments?path=/dir1/dir2/*txt" /pxf/ is made part of the path when there is a webapp by that name in tomcat.

        The function is called when http://nn:port/pxf/{version}/Fragmenter/getFragments?path=... is used.
        Parameters:
        servletContext - Servlet context contains attributes required by SecuredHDFS
        headers - Holds HTTP headers from request
        path - Holds URI path option used in this request
        Returns:
        response object with JSON serialized fragments metadata

        java.lang.Exception - if getting fragments info failed
